column5: Hi, we hope everyone had a great long weekend and fishing weekend. Like my previous post we were doing as good as we usually do and my kids wanted to go back to our favourite watering hole. So after breakfest we headed out to our spot and the conservation area was packed. But the fishing pond wasn't. There was a family in our usual spot, which my son wasn't to happy about but we fished off of the dock directly across from it.  He was glad that we did because he got his highest catch number to date. He caught a total of 9 sunfish. My daughter also caught her highest number which was 5, sunfish. She has only caught 3 to date since we started in July, so she was thrilled about fishing today. She is already telling people that they were as far as her arms could stretch when they were really 5-6", what a fish story teller.  Anyways, here are some pics.   Here's my daughter's 1 of the day   Here's number 2   Here's number 3   Here's number 4  I have some more pics. Not sure how you guys put on so many pictures, I have made these so tinyjust to get these four on here. I've cropped and made the image sizes smaller. But I can only get 4 on here. Tell me if I'm doing something wrong. I'll put the other pics on the next reply.

Here's number 5   My son's First of the day   His third of the day   His 6th of the day, He only wanted me to put the pics of the big fish on the site, a true fisherman.  We'll that's it from us and we all hope that everyone has a great back to school day tomorrow. Next post will be next weekend because we will only be fishing on the weekends now.  Bye all
Nice job smokin, great to see the kids out enjoying the fishing.  Sounds like your daughter is a true fisherperson already with the size stretching  Nice report, thanks.

If you put your pictures on a hosting site, you can put a link to them in your reports, and have as many as you want. I use myfishingpictures.com or you could use photobucket.com. Great pics of the kids and their catches by the way.

Great report, and some real nice pictures of the kids having fun! Guess what? Mine are all pretty much grown up, but when they do go out for a couple of hours, little panfish like those Sunny's make the day!
Great report. Looks like you have two fishing partners for life!
Great report and some nice fish for the little ones!  We haven't been there in a while...good to see they are still biting and getting bigger.  Congrats on a great day out there!
good report,looks like your kids had a blast
If you don't mind kindly let us know where you went to fish!
